node.address: Cielo Mar CRA 9 17 20, Cielo Mar CRA 9 17 20 , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
Hotel Summer is 4 km from Cartagena's Convention Centre. Cartagena's Walls is 4 km from the hotel, while San Felipe de Barajas Castle is 4.1 km away.

All of the comfortable and modern guestrooms at Summer Hotel are fitted with air conditioning, a minibar, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Some offer a balcony with views of the sea. All bathroom facilities are private and include hot water and a hairdryer. Towels and bed linens are provided.

Hotel Summer offers beachfront accommodation in Cartagena de Indias, a short walk from Las Américas Convention Center and 1 km from Rafael Nuñez Airport. It has a bar and free WiFi throughout. A daily breakfast is served.

The comfortable and modern rooms at the Summer Hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a minibar, a flat-screen TV and a safe. Some have a balcony with sea views. All include a private bathroom with hot water and a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.
The establishment has a shared lounge, a small supermarket and a 24-hour reception with tourist information service. Free parking is available.
Hotel Summer is 4 km from the Cartagena Convention Center and the Cartagena Walls, and 4.1 km from San Felipe de Barajas Castle. An airport shuttle service is available upon request.

description.description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and a solarium overlooking the ocean, Hotel Summer offers beachfront accommodation in Cartagena de Indias, a few steps from Centro de Convenciones Las Americas and 1 km from Rafael Nuñez Airport. Free WiFi access is provided throughout the property, and guests can enjoy the on-site bar. A daily breakfast is served. Guests can unwind in the shared lounge at the property. There is a mini-market on site. A 24-hour front-desk is available to welcome guests and provide tourist information. Complimentary parking is provided. Hotel Summer 4 km from Cartagena's Convention Centre. Cartagena's Walls is 4 km from the hotel, while San Felipe de Barajas Castle is 4.1 km away. There is a Hotel- Airport shuttle available upon request.
